title: WHEN WILL THE NEW CLIENT ADD OTHER GAME MODES?
body: SO BASICALLY ALL I AM TRYING TO SAY IS WHEN WILL THE OTHER GAME FEATURES LIKE URF, ONE FOR ALL AND OTHER GAME MODES COMING TO THE NEW CLIENT ANYONE KNOWS?

replies.body: You don't have to type it in all caps, It's coming soon, they're currently testing King Poro and Nexus Seige on the PBE.
We're planning to add rotating game modes with 6.24

How 'bout bots for custom games?

I don't always like playing with real humans :(
YAAY! That will be nice...Thanks for the reply
sorry about the caps :/ i actually didnt really notice it but thanks for the reply
sorry about the caps :/ i actually didnt really notice it but thanks for the reply
